replies.msg:
求教Excel入面增加/減少小數點後數字既shortcut(除咗alt+h+0/9)

Google咗好耐都冇

Increase and decrease decimal amounts quickly without using your mouse
Select column F.
Press the 'ALT' key. ...
The 'Increase Decimal' and 'Decrease Decimal' commands are located on the 'Home' tab. ...
The Increase and Decrease Decimal icons have a '0' and a '9' as their respective shortcuts.
Source: Google
